ygData.subject: Re: fun after 40
ygData.msgSnippet: ... That s great!  You re certainly on the tip of the demographic curve for computer games.  How did you happen to start playing Everquest? By the way, I m 35.
ygData.messageBody:
Janice writes:
>By the way, regarding the subject of "older women" playing EQ, I bet I am
>one of oldest. I will be 49 next month. Not that it matters. Maybe it
>will give some of you young gals hope that there IS fun after 40. Boy, is
>there ever fun after 40.

That's great! You're certainly on the tip of the demographic curve for
computer games. How did you happen to start playing Everquest?

By the way, I'm 35. My mother is over 60, and she plays some computer
games. She has a Macintosh, though, so I can't introduce her to Everquest.

- Beth "BethMo" Moursund
Windsong Wanderer on Solusek Ro
